ComicInfo.Summary:
The Second Possession of Angela Lake!: Johnny Peril has been hired by Mr. Lake to find his missing daughter whom he believes may be possessed by a demon.
A Match Made in Hades!: Harold buys a love potion to make Lydia fall in love with him but he is soon looking for the antidote.
Bruce the Barbarian!: After being dumped by Cornelia, Bruce uses the powers of his mind to transport himself to another place where he is a barbarian hero.
